templates.title: 25-Seven PDMX (host)
templates.description: PDMX Program Delay Manager with `host` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname and studio (if applicable).

env.name: IFACE_AOIP
env.label: AoIP network interface
env.description: REQUIRED. Network interface on the host system for AoIP traffic. (eg: eth0, eno1, enp1s0)

templates.title: 25-Seven PDMX (macvlan)
templates.description: PDMX Program Delay Manager with `macvlan` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname and studio (if applicable).

env.name: IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

templates.title: Telos VXS (host)
templates.description: Telos VXS VoIP Phone System with `host` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname and studio (if applicable).

env.name: IFACE_AOIP_SYNC
env.label: AoIP clock network interface
env.description: REQUIRED. Network interface for AoIP clock traffic. (eg: eth0, eno1, enp1s0)

env.name: SYNC_CLOCK
env.label: Audio timebase source
env.description: Options: [ptp-snooping] Software PTP. Default option | [clock-tai] OS TAI time | [/dev/ptp0] PTP hardware timestamp device

env.name: SYNC_PTP_DOMAIN
env.label: PTP domain number
env.description: Set the PTP domain number. Applies to ptp-snooping with PTP clock only.

templates.title: Telos Zephyr Connect (host)
templates.description: Telos Zephyr Connect Codec with `host` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname and studio (if applicable).

env.name: IFACE_AOIP
env.label: AoIP network interface
env.description: REQUIRED. Network interface on the host system for AoIP traffic. (eg: eth0, eno1, enp1s0)

env.name: IFACE_EXT
env.label: External network interface
env.description: REQUIRED. Network interface on host system for streaming and web browser traffic. (eg: eth0, eno1, enp1s0). It is recommended to list the IFACE_AOIP interface as well to allow GUI access from both networks. This is done via csv. (eg: eno1, eno2)

templates.title: Omnia Forza HDS (host)
templates.description: Omnia Forza HDS audio processor with `host` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname and studio (if applicable).

env.name: HTTP_PORT
env.label: Web Interface TCP Port
env.description: TCP Port used to run the web server that serves the GUI and API.

env.name: IFACE_AOIP
env.label: AoIP network interface
env.description: REQUIRED. Network interface on the host system for AoIP traffic. (eg: eth0, eno1, enp1s0)

env.name: EX_CLOCK_SOURCE
env.label: Audio timebase source
env.description: Options: [ptp-snooping] Software PTP. Recommended in most cases | [clock-tai] OS TAI time | [/dev/ptp0] PTP hardware timestamp device

env.name: EX_AOIP_CLOCK
env.label: AoIP Clock Type
env.description: Applies to 'ptp-snooping' only, type of clock packets to receive: [0] PTP | [1] Livewire

env.name: EX_PTP_DOMAIN
env.label: PTP domain number
env.description: Set the PTP domain number. Applies to ptp-snooping with PTP clock only.

env.name: EX_AOIP_TASK_RATE
env.label: Task Execution
env.description: Set the rate at which AoIP packets are sent. This not packet length. It is how frequently packets are sent. The default is 1000 and ideal for most systems. More latency sensitive system should use lower numbers.

env.name: EX_RT_CPU
env.label: Realtime Reserved CPU
env.description: CPU number (using OS numbering) on which the container will always run realtime tasks and never run non-realtime tasks. Leave blank to run all tasks on all CPUs.

env.label: Stack Name
env.description: Set the container names and hostnames of each container in the stack.

env.label: Forza FM software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: FORZA_HTTP_PORT
env.label: Forza Web Interface TCP Port
env.description: TCP Port used to run the web server that serves the GUI and API.

env.name: FORZA_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: Forza FM AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

env.name: EX_CLOCK_SOURCE
env.label: Audio timebase source
env.description: Options: [ptp-snooping] Software PTP. Recommended in most cases | [clock-tai] OS TAI time | [/dev/ptp0] PTP hardware timestamp device

env.name: EX_AOIP_CLOCK
env.label: AoIP Clock Type
env.description: Applies to 'ptp-snooping' only, type of clock packets to receive: [0] PTP | [1] Livewire

env.name: EX_PTP_DOMAIN
env.label: PTP domain number
env.description: Set the PTP domain number. Applies to ptp-snooping with PTP clock only.

env.name: FORZA_EX_RT_CPU
env.label: Forza Realtime Reserved CPU
env.description: CPU number (using OS numbering) on which the container will always run realtime tasks and never run non-realtime tasks. Leave blank to run all tasks on all CPUs.

env.name: FORZA_AOIP_TASK_RATE
env.label: Forza Task Execution
env.description: Set the rate at which AoIP packets are sent. This not packet length. It is how frequently packets are sent. The default is 1000 and ideal for most systems. More latency sensitive system should use lower numbers.

env.name: FM_TRANSPORT_TAG

env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.label: FM Transport Web Interface TCP Port
env.description: TCP Port used to run the web server that serves the GUI and API.

env.name: FM_TRANSPORT_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: FM Transport AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

templates.title: PTP4L (host)
templates.description: Precision Time Protocol Daemon for Linux with `host` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname and studio (if applicable).

env.name: PTP4L_ARGS
env.label: ptp4l command line args
env.description: Command line arguments for ptp4l. Details here: linux.die.net/man/8/ptp4l. Leave blank if unsure

templates.title: WebRTC Service (macvlan)
templates.description: Proxy service connected to the telosmacvlan network

env.name: STACK_NAME
env.label: Stack Name
env.description: Set the container names and hostnames of each container in the stack.

env.name: NGINX_TAG
env.label: NGINX software version tag
env.description: Version of NGINX software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: NGINX_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: NGINX AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

env.name: TAP_TAG
env.label: Telos Auto Proxy software version tag
env.description: Version of Telos Auto Proxy software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: ACME_TAG
env.label: ACME software version tag
env.description: Version of ACME. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: ACME_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: ACME AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

env.name: DOMAINNAME
env.label: Domain Name
env.description: Domain a certification will be requested for.

env.name: CERT_EMAIL
env.label: Email
env.description: Email certificate renewal notices will be sent to.

env.name: CERT_MODE
env.label: Certificate Mode
env.description: Sets whether ACME will pull a certification or just test. production - will pull a cert. staging - will test a cert. This template defaults to production.

env.name: COTURN_TAG
env.label: Coturn software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: COTURN_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: Coturn AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

env.name: PUBLICIP
env.label: Public IP
env.description: The Public IP Address the network this host is connected to.

env.name: TURNUSERNAME
env.label: Turn Username
env.description: Username that is used for authentication when TURN Connections are being made.

env.name: TURNPASSWORD
env.label: Turn Password
env.description: Password that is used for authentication when TURN Connections are being made.

env.name: MINIMUMPORT
env.label: Minimum Turn Port
env.description: Lowest number port used for TURN connection. Leave this blank to use the default port number (49152) which works with most firewalls.

env.name: MAXIMUMPORT
env.label: Maximum Turn Port
env.description: Highest number port used for TURN connection. Leave this blank to use the default port number (65535) which works with most firewalls.

env.name: BEACON_TAG
env.label: Beacon software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default.

env.name: BEACON_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: Beacon AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.

env.name: BEACON_IFACE_AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: Beacon AoIP IPv4 address
env.description: REQUIRED. Static IPv4 address assigned to the interface assigned to the telosmacvlan bridge. Must be within the same subnet.
